ltminigames.command.team_chat_intro: You are using team chat. Use /shout or /chat global to chat with everyone.
You can only place plants you got from the shop!
You gained %s biodiversity points!
...and lost %s biodiversity points!
YOU DIED
Welcome to Biodiversity Blitz!
As the professional conservationist that you surely are, you must turn this bare plot into a thriving ecosystem.
You can buy plants and items from the shop using your 'Biodiversity points' and place them in your plot!
These plants may provide food, defense, or even attack the invasive species. Every plant you place improves the number of biodiversity points received per turn.
Invasive species will be spawning soon! But if you construct an ecosystem that is resilient enough, you may be able to survive.
Make sure to have a large variety of different plants in your plot- diversity in an ecosystem only makes you stronger!
You win the game once you accumulate the target amount of osa points- you can check your progress in the top-left of your screen!
Good luck!

Biodiversity Blitz
Welcome to Biodiversity Blitz!
As the professional conservationist that you surely are, you must turn this bare plot into a thriving ecosystem.
You can buy plants and items from the shop using your 'Biodiversity points' and place them in your plot!
These plants may provide food, defense, or even attack the invasive species. Every plant you place improves the number of biodiversity points received per turn.
Invasive species will be spawning soon! But if you construct an ecosystem that is resilient enough, you may be able to survive.
Make sure to have a large variety of different plants in your plot- diversity in an ecosystem only makes you stronger!
You win the game once your team accumulates the target amount of osa points- you can check your progress in the top-left of your screen!
Good luck!
Beware the creeper. The legends say that its explosion can level even the sturdiest of trees...
Crops are weaker than other plants, so put them in places where mobs can't get to them!
The Commelina Diffusa can put out the Crocosmia's fires. Be careful of where you plant them!
Make sure to have a plot with many different plant types to gain more osa points!
Be careful of having too much of the same plant, monocultures can hurt your point production!
Rumours say that if you're patient enough, oak trees will drop golden apples. Could it possibly be true?
Mangrove trees produce pianguas in mud that can be harvested via right click to sell at the store!
Mobs loooove pumpkins. Place them in strategic places to create elaborate traps!
If you change your mind about tilling a piece of land, simply right click it with your hoe to make it into grass again!
You can visit other players' plots to learn from how they've set up their plot!
The waves will get harder as time goes on, so be quick!
Trading
Wave Incoming!
Wave %s
A wave has spawned! Your plant defense may not yet be self-sufficient, use your sword to defend your plot!
A wave is coming soon! Make sure your plant defenses are ready!
Rain acid down on the players' heads for 1 minute!
It is raining acid for 1 minute!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.antidote_p: Help someone avoid bad effects by giving them a Bucket of Milk!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.armor_stan: Turn all players into Armor Stands for 2 minutes. What?
For 2 minutes, you have become an Armor Stand. What?
ltminigames.minigame.donation.basilisk_l: Turn every player into a Basilisk Lizard for 2 minutes
Everyone is a Basilisk Lizard for 2 minutes!
Turn the dial down on pesky gravity - gravity is reduced for 2 minutse!
Take a big leap! Gravity has been reduced for 2 minutes!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.boom_packa: Give a bunch of throwable, Exploding Coconuts to everyoen!
%sender% sent everyone a BOOM PACKAGE of 4 Coconut Bombs!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.chosen_cre: A Creeper primed for explosion is spawned right where the selected player is standing
%sender% sent you a CREEPER SABOTAGE! Look out!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.cubera_con: Turn every player into fish for 2 minutes
Oops, we're all fish for 2 minutes!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.driftwood_: Turn every player into Driftwood for 2 minutes
ltminigames.minigame.donation.equalize_c: Redistributes all of the currency in the game by averaging it between everyone.
All players' currency has been averaged together!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.forced_pla: Force every player in the game to wear the player head of your Minecraft avatar (and Curse of Binding)
You are now wearing %sender%'s head, and you can't do anything about it!

%sender% sent you helpful effects for 1 minute!

%sender% sent you a HUNGER SABOTAGE for 1 minute!
ltminigames.minigame.donation.invisibili: Gives Invisibility to a selected player for 2 minutes
%sender% sent you an INVISIBILITY PACKAGE! You are invisible for 2 minutes.
ltminigames.minigame.donation.its_been_f: It's been fun, but with this package you can end the entire game in style
It's been fun, but %sender% has ENDED THE GAME!

%sender% sent you a KNOCKBACK PACKAGE! Use the Teeter Yeeter™ wisely.

%sender% sent you a LIGHTNING STRIKE! Look out!

%sender% started a METEOR STORM! Look out!

ltminigames.minigame.donation.player_tor: Turn a player into a Tornado. Yes. Literally.
Turn a player into a small Tornado. Lasts 33% longer than the big Tornado package.

Where did that Pufferfish come from? %sender% may know.
ltminigames.minigame.donation.random_cre: Spawns a Creeper primed for explosion next to a random player

ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide.ac:
Prevents acid rain from harming you.

Active when held in main or offhand.
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide.ba: Collect Loot Before the Tide Rises
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide.ou: Through the rising sea levels, the volatile and chaotic weather, and the struggle to survive, one player remains: %winner%.
Those who have fallen have been swept away by the encroaching tides that engulf countless landmasses in this dire future.
The lone survivor of this city, %winner%, has won - but at what cost? The world is not what it once was, and they must survive in this new apocalyptic land.
What would you do different next time? Together, we could stop this from becoming our future.
The game will close in 10 seconds...
Through the rising sea levels, the volatile and chaotic weather, and the struggle to survive, one team remains: %winner%.
Those who have fallen have been swept away by the encroaching tides that engulf countless landmasses in this dire future.
The remaining survivors of this island, have won - but at what cost? The world is not what it once was, and they must survive in this new apocalyptic land.
What would you do different next time? Together, we could stop this from becoming our future.
The game will close in 10 seconds...
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide.st: ATTENTION ALL REMAINING UN SCIENCE PERSONNEL
The final evacuation shuttle is departing in 15 minutes
Meteorological sensors indicate incoming hostile rainfall patterns.
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide.su:
Prevents heatwaves from slowing you down.

Active when held in main or offhand.
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide.to:
WEATHER REPORT:
Acid Rain is falling!
Find shelter, or make sure to carry an Acid Repellent Umbrella!
THE EXPLOSIVE STORM HAS STARTED CLOSING IN! Get to the center!

WEATHER REPORT:
Seek higher ground! Heavy rains are falling!

WEATHER REPORT:
Hail is falling!
Find shelter, or make sure to carry an Acid Repellent Umbrella!

WEATHER REPORT:
A Heat Wave is passing!
Stay inside, or make sure to equip Super Sunscreen!
A loot drop will arrive in 1 minute! Find the nearest beacon beam!
The tide will soon begin to rise, and PVP will be enabled! Collect resources before the time runs out!

WEATHER REPORT:
A Sandstorm is passing!
Find shelter!

WEATHER REPORT:
A Snowstorm is passing!
Find shelter!
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide_do: IT'S DOWN TO TWO PLAYERS! %s and %s are now head to head - who will triumph above these rising tides?
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide_fi: Through the rising sea levels, the volatile and chaotic weather, and the struggle to survive, one player remains: %s.
Those who have fallen have been swept away by the encroaching tides that engulf countless landmasses in this dire future.
The lone survivor of this island, %s, has won - but at what cost? The world is not what it once was, and they must survive in this new apocalyptic land.
What would you do different next time? Together, we could stop this from becoming our future.
ltminigames.minigame.survive_the_tide_in: The year...2050. Human-caused climate change has gone unmitigated and the human population has been forced to flee to higher ground.
Your task, should you choose to accept it, which you have to because of climate change, is to survive the rising tides, unpredictable weather, and other players.
Brave the conditions and defeat the others who are just trying to survive, like you. And remember...your resources are as limited as your time.
Someone else may have the tool or food you need to survive. What kind of person will you be when the world is falling apart?
ltminigames.minigame.teams.intro_2: You can select a team preference by using the items in your inventory:
